about_the_game:
You are arriving in London, the focus of the world’s high finance and reigning monarch of modern mass communication. Skyscrapers are springing up everywhere as the world clamors for office space here among the history and pageantry of England’s capital. In London Life, you will be challenged to create gleaming office towers for titans of trade, elite global stock exchanges and moguls of media. Your towers will be crowned with soaring antennae and space-facing satellite dishes to access the global information network.

London Calling
London Life adds 12 new office tenants, all looking for space to let within the coveted confines of this regal city. Financiers have always flocked to London; from small banks to sprawling stock exchanges, everybody wants to be near the global hub of commerce in the City. But in recent years, creatives of all types have also found the city’s spirit irresistible: from small recording studios and indie game developers, to bustling newsrooms and lofty movie studios, all are attracted by London’s bright lights and pulsing glamor.

Rule Britannia
London Life brings some British verve into your buildings. Traditional pubs and elegant restaurants impart a bit of English charm to your dining and drinking destinations. Luxuriant lobbies with chic chandeliers create impressive entryways. When combined with a variety of opulent outdoor decorations and posh new artworks, your new London premises will radiate refinement and prestige.
detailed_description:
NEW GAME FROM THE DEVELOPER


About the Game

You are arriving in London, the focus of the world’s high finance and reigning monarch of modern mass communication. Skyscrapers are springing up everywhere as the world clamors for office space here among the history and pageantry of England’s capital. In London Life, you will be challenged to create gleaming office towers for titans of trade, elite global stock exchanges and moguls of media. Your towers will be crowned with soaring antennae and space-facing satellite dishes to access the global information network.

London Calling
London Life adds 12 new office tenants, all looking for space to let within the coveted confines of this regal city. Financiers have always flocked to London; from small banks to sprawling stock exchanges, everybody wants to be near the global hub of commerce in the City. But in recent years, creatives of all types have also found the city’s spirit irresistible: from small recording studios and indie game developers, to bustling newsrooms and lofty movie studios, all are attracted by London’s bright lights and pulsing glamor.

Rule Britannia
London Life brings some British verve into your buildings. Traditional pubs and elegant restaurants impart a bit of English charm to your dining and drinking destinations. Luxuriant lobbies with chic chandeliers create impressive entryways. When combined with a variety of opulent outdoor decorations and posh new artworks, your new London premises will radiate refinement and prestige.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.11 or later
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated video (Intel HD 4000 or later), 1 GB shared memory
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Display: 1280 x 720
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.11 or later
  • Processor: Core i7
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated video, 1 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Display: 1920 x 1080

name: Project Highrise: London Life
